title: Want a vaccine? Walgreens wants your data first.
description:
As the Covid-19 vaccine rollout continues, finding an appointment is competitive. Very competitive. So the federal government is working with national pharmacy chains like Walgreens and CVS to help distribute more vaccines. But to make an appointment, you may need to share some of your personal data.
References:
Read Sara Morrison’s story here
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: So you’ve made a Walgreens account to make a vaccine appointment. What are they going to do with your data?
